content: there s something about having handmade items that are both useful and decorative in your kitchen that brings a whole extra level of home feeling this fast and easy crochet kitchen towel pattern will help bring that handmade feeling into your kitchen in no time whether you re looking to add a crochet dishtowel to your linen closet for it s usefulness to create a set of crochet dishcloths as a housewarming gift or to decorate your kitchen just enough to get yourself interested in cooking every night looking at myself here you ll love the simple texture and easy construction of this crochet kitchen towel skill level advanced beginner- this crochet kitchen towel use fairly basic stitches and techniques that most advanced beginners should know you should know how to chain slip_stitch single_crochet and double_crochet you should know how to create chain spaces and work into them you should also know how to begin a project in a circle whether that is using a magic_ring or chain 3 slip_stitch to first chain circle there is the addition of the linked double_crochet which is a modified version of the double_crochet which is slightly more advanced i have a full step by step photo tutorial on my blog linked in the pdf and this pattern comes with a step-by-step tutorial as well as long as you can double_crochet you should be able to linked double_crochet pattern includes 1 full version pdf with photo tutorial for the starting row which will set you up to properly repeat the row as necessary the photo tutorial also includes details on how to place the border on this crochet kitchen towel as well as create the loop for hanging this photo tutorial also has the steps written in detail not short hand to help beginners through 2 printer friendly pdf with only one picture and 4 pages to save ink terms used us standard pattern is written in english size approximately 10 5 inches by 10 5 inches the size of this crochet kitchen towel pattern is very easy to customize materials required for both of this crochet kitchen towel you will need medium 4 weight cotton yarn you will need approximately 2 5 ounces/ 69 grams/ 125 yards yarn used in sample i love this cotton in colorway banana 100% cotton exclusively sold at hobby lobby tools 5 mm h-8 hook tapestry needle scissors stitch markers make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love tag @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet to show me your finished work happy crocheting the loophole fox
